register.title: Iyandikishe
register.firstNameMin: Izina rya mbere rigomba kugira inyuguti 2 byibuze
register.lastNameMin: Izina rya nyuma rigomba kugira inyuguti 2 byibuze
register.passwordMin: Ijambo ry'ibanga rigomba kugira inyuguti 6 byibuze
register.passwordNumber: Ijambo ry'ibanga rigomba kugira umubare umwe byibuze
register.passwordUppercase: Ijambo ry'ibanga rigomba kugira inyuguti nkuru imwe byibuze
register.successMessage: Kwiyandikisha byagenze neza! Nyamuneka emeza imeyili yawe ukoresheje kode yoherejwe.
register.error: Hari ikibazo cyabaye mu gihe cyo kwiyandikisha

forgotPassword.title: Wibagiwe Ijambo ry'ibanga
forgotPassword.description: Andika imeyili yawe maze tuzakoherereze link yo guhindura ijambo ry'ibanga.
forgotPassword.success: Link yo guhindura ijambo ry'ibanga yoherejwe kuri imeyili yawe.
forgotPassword.error: Ntabwo twashoboye kohereza link. Nyamuneka ongera ugerageze.

resetPassword.title: Hindura Ijambo ry'ibanga
resetPassword.success: Ijambo ry'ibanga ryahinduwe neza. Nyamuneka injira ukoresheje ijambo ry'ibanga rishya.
resetPassword.error: Ntabwo twashoboye guhindura ijambo ry'ibanga. Link ishobora kuba itakiri nyayo cyangwa yarangije igihe.

messages.registerSuccess: Kwiyandikisha byagenze neza. Nyamuneka reba imeyili yawe kugira ngo wemeze konti yawe.
